bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make something sweet and sticky!
🐝 I live in a hive with lots of friends.
🌸 I help flowers make seeds.

bug.question: I am red with black spots and I'm good luck to have. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 People often make wishes when they see me.
🌿 I eat tiny bugs that can hurt plants.
⚫ I have dots on my back.

bug.question: I march in lines and carry food, sometimes bigger than me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony with a queen.
🌱 I am a very strong worker.
🍕 I like to carry crumbs back home.

bug.question: I jump very high and I am green. I like to eat plants.

hints.text: 🟢 I can blend in well with grass.
🎶 You can hear me chirp in the summer.
🦵I have strong legs for leaping.

bug.question: I can change colors and fly gracefully. I start as a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I am often seen in gardens.
🐛 First, I'm a little crawler that eats leaves.
🌈 I have beautiful wings with patterns.

bug.question: I have a long body and many legs. I crawl around in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I like to hide under rocks and logs.
💯 I have more than ten legs.
⚫ My name sounds like it has 'a thousand' in it!

bug.question: I glow in the dark and fly at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I use my light to attract a mate.
🌙 I am active when it's dark out.
💡 People think I am magical because of the glow

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs.
🕷️ I eat flies that get trapped.
🏠 Some people are afraid of me, even though I'm helpful.

bug.question: I drink blood and I can be itchy. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I am a pest on warm nights.
🚫 Use spray to keep me away
🧛 My bite can sometimes make you sick.

bug.question: I live in the water and eat mosquitoes. People like me because of that, what am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have big eyes and clear wings.
🐟 I help keep ponds and lakes clean.
👑 I am known to be beautiful.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am a fruit
🌱 I grow on trees
🐒 Monkeys like to eat me

food.question: I am white and cold, and I'm often served in a cone. I come in lots of flavors! What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am frozen
🍦 People like to eat me in the summer
👅 I can be chocolate, vanilla, or strawberry

food.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetable.
🐰 Rabbits like to eat me.
🌱 I grow in the ground.

food.question: I am round and red, and I grow on trees. Sometimes I'm in pies! What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on a tree
🥧 I am a fruit often used in desserts
🍎 Snow White liked me

food.question: I am made of bread, cheese, and tomato sauce, and I'm often cut into slices. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I am an Italian dish.
🍞 I am made with bread.
🔥 I am baked in an oven.

food.question: I am made of milk, but I'm hard and come in different colors. Mice love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from a cow.
🐭 A mouse might like to nibble on me.
🧀 I'm a popular topping for crackers.

food.question: I am a drink that is often served warm. I am made from leaves and can be green, black, or herbal. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ Some people drink me to wake up in the morning.
🍃 I am made from leaves that grow on a bush.
🫖 I am good with honey.

food.question: I am a small, round vegetable that can be red, yellow, or green. I am often used in salads. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I am often eaten raw.
🌍 I grow on a vine.
🍅 I am used to make sauce sometimes.

food.question: I am a yellow spread that is made from milk. You can put me on bread or toast. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from cows.
🍞 I make bread taste better.
💛 I am the colour of sunshine.

food.question: I am a dessert that is baked in the oven and is often decorated with frosting. People sing 'Happy Birthday' when I am around. What am I?

hints.text: 🎂 You might have me at a party
🕯️ You often blow out candles on me.
👨‍🍳 Someone special makes me, and often I'm vanilla or chocolate.
